meanings.definition: A non-alcoholic drink consisting of a mixture of fruit juices or other soft drinks.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served delicious mocktails to the guests.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy sipping on mocktails by the pool on hot days.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they pretended to make fancy mocktails for their teddy bears.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed as she crafted colorful mocktails for the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the mocktails brightened up the table setting.

meanings.definition: To make a mocktail or mocktails.
meanings.sent1: She mocktails the drinks with precision to ensure they taste perfect.
meanings.sent2: We mocktail together every weekend, experimenting with new flavors.
meanings.sent3: He mocktails like a pro, impressing everyone with his mixing skills.
meanings.sent4: The bartender mocktails the beverages with flair, creating a delightful experience.
meanings.sent5: Mocktailing requires creativity and attention to detail to achieve the right balance of flavors.
